general_info.summary: This text provides information about a Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) program offered at Noida International University. The university is identified as a state private university established by UP Govt. Act 27 of 2010 and recognized by UGC under Section 22 of UGC Act 1956.
general_info.raw_content:
BCA (Bachelor of Computer Applications)
Noida International University
(A State Private University Established by UP Govt. Act 27 of 2010 & Recognized by UGC under Section 22 of UGC Act 1956)
